description:
http://anidb.net/ch115349 [Yamagami] and http://anidb.net/ch111124 [Kurusu] reflect on their new vampiric lives as it sinks in that they are now legally dead. Meanwhile, the army brass pressure http://anidb.net/ch111121 [Maeda] and http://anidb.net/ch111120 [Nakajima] for results, aiming to cut funding for Code Zero. 
Source: Funimation
